docs.text:
vSphere & Horizon Upgrades


07/25/18


Overview


vSphere 6.7 now supports suspend and resume with NVIDIA vGPUs so we need to upgrade to take advantage of all the enhancements announced in the Horizon View 7.5 release. 
Here's a good 
post
 with more info... These are my notes for upgrading our entire environment.


Resources




Update sequence for vSphere 6.7 and its compatible VMware products
